parameters.command:
=set -e
P=/data/projects/{{$item(0).$node['Parse Project ID'].json.project_id}}
mkdir -p "$P/state" "$P/logs" "$P/repo" "$P/tasks"
printf '{"phase":"RUNNING","running":true,"updated_at":"%s"}' "$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)" > "$P/state/status.json"
echo "Execution started at $(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)" > "$P/logs/build.log"

=set -e
P=/data/projects/{{$item(0).$node['Parse Project ID'].json.project_id}}
SPEC="$P/project_spec.md"
STACK=nextjs
if [ -f "$SPEC" ]; then
  if grep -qi laravel "$SPEC"; then STACK=laravel; fi
  if grep -qi flutter "$SPEC"; then STACK=flutter; fi
fi
mkdir -p "$P/repo"
cat > "$P/repo/README.md" <<'EOF'
# Generated Project

This project scaffold was generated by AI Software Factory workflow.
EOF
printf '{"stack":"%s"}' "$STACK" > "$P/state/spec.json"
echo "Template/scaffold prepared (stack=$STACK)" >> "$P/logs/build.log"

=set -e
PID='{{$item(0).$node['Parse Project ID'].json.project_id}}'
P=/data/projects/$PID
( cd "$P/repo" && find . -type f | sort ) > "$P/repo_tree.txt"
tar -cf "$P/$PID.zip" -C "$P/repo" .
BR=deliver/$PID
printf '{"phase":"PASSED","running":false,"github_branch":"%s","zip":"%s","updated_at":"%s"}' "$BR" "$P/$PID.zip" "$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)" > "$P/state/status.json"
echo "Execution completed successfully" >> "$P/logs/build.log"
